description:
The Ghost Girl doesn`t feel she`s scary enough, so she asks the Keroro Platoon for a makeover.  Then Giroro gets mistaken for a handsome Prince Charming when he saves one of Natsumi`s friends from a monster!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ghost Girl, Before-After / Giroro, the Red Fairy
幽霊ちゃん ビフォーアフター であります / ギロロ 赤い妖精 であります
